description: Try our easy to follow Scallops With White Bean Purée recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Scallops With White Bean Purée Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the beans, garlic and stock in a saucepan and bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from the heat, drain off any excess liquid, then mash with a potato masher and stir in the parsley. Keep warm.
Heat half the oil in a nonstick frying pan, add the leeks and fry for 2 minutes, then add the measurement water. Cover and simmer for 5-6 minutes until tender.

Meanwhile, heat the remaining oil in a small frying pan, add the scallops and fry for 1 minute on each side until just cooked through. Serve with the white bean purée and leeks and garnish with parsley sprigs.
